introductionBanner.motto:
At Fizjo+ I thoroughly analyze each patient's problem to create an individual therapy plan.

My mission is not only to relieve pain during a visit, but above all to restore full fitness and improve the quality of life.

bookAppointment.title: <blue>Book an appointment</blue> to take care of your health

howCanIHelp.title: <blue>How can I help</blue> you return to full fitness?
howCanIHelp.content:
I focus on fast and effective treatment of ailments, using proven and safe therapeutic methods.

I offer, among others:orthopedic rehabilitation,sports,post-traumatic,neurological,geriatric,correction of posture defects.
I also offer home visits.

My office is conveniently located near the city center, and modern equipment and constant expansion of my professional competences help patients quickly return to full health.

aboutMe.title: <blue>About me</blue> and my experience
aboutMe.content:
I hold a master's degree in physiotherapy, with extensive experience and a passion for working with patients, which I have been developing since 2017. Since 2019, I have held my master’s degree in physiotherapy, and since 2020, I have been operating my own practice, where I specialize in orthopedic and sports rehabilitation.

I focus on treating patients with various musculoskeletal issues, offering a personalized approach tailored to each individual’s needs. I have completed numerous courses that enhance the quality of my work, including training in taping, the Cyriax method, deep tissue massage, and myofascial techniques. This allows me to effectively apply advanced therapeutic techniques that produce real and lasting results.

In my practice, every patient can expect professional care and comprehensive support at every stage of their therapy. My goal is to provide maximum support in the return to full function and to improve the quality of life for my patients.

I invite those seeking effective and professional physiotherapy that delivers visible results to work with me.

services.title: <blue>Services</blue> and treatment methods
services.content: We offer a wide range of physiotherapy services:

sports.title: Sports Rehabilitation
sports.description: Return to physical activity after injuries

posture.title: Posture Correction
posture.description: Diagnosis and treatment of posture defects

contact.title: Book appointment
contact.content: Contact us by phone or through the online form to schedule an appointment at a convenient time.

questionnaire.title: Fill out questionnaire
questionnaire.content: Download and complete the health questionnaire before your first visit. This will help us better prepare for the consultation.

documents.title: Prepare documents
documents.content: Prepare medical documentation: test results, X-rays, MRI or other relevant documents.

preparation.title: Prepare for visit
preparation.content: Wear comfortable sports clothing that will allow for easy exercise and examination.
